attributes.action: Change the current age group 18-65 yr olds on mental health acute wards.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am a second year mental health nursing student and have a lot of past experience and now training to be a  mental health nurse; therefore on wards of lot of the time. 
I feel that a change is needed because of such a vast age range on mental health wards. Currently 18 to 65 years old, 18-35year olds and 36-65 yr olds would be a better age range for mental health wards.
